title: Monsanto 's number of regular and temporary workers worldwide 2013 to 2017
summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 2 different Worker Types for 5 groups 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017 that are presented on the X-axis.
In Worker Type Regular workers, 2015 had the highest SOME LABEL 22500.0 among the 5 groups and in Temporary workers, 2017 had the lowest SOME LABEL 2800.0.
In Worker Type Regular workers, 2016 had the maximum SOME LABEL and it saw the lowest in Worker Type Temporary workers out of all 2 Worker Types.
There is a gap of 17500.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for 2016 in Worker Type Regular workers and Temporary workers.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 2 different Worker Types for 5 groups 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017 that are presented on the X-axis.
In Worker Type Regular workers, 2015 had the highest SOME LABEL 22500.0 among the 5 groups and in Temporary workers, 2017 had the lowest SOME LABEL 2800.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 2 different Worker Types for 5 groups 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017 that are presented on the X-axis.
In Worker Type Regular workers, 2015 had the highest SOME LABEL 22500.0 among the 5 groups and in Temporary workers, 2017 had the lowest SOME LABEL 2800.0.
In Worker Type Regular workers, 2016 had the maximum SOME LABEL and it saw the lowest in Worker Type Temporary workers out of all 2 Worker Types.
There is a gap of 17500.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for 2016 in Worker Type Regular workers and Temporary workers.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 2 different Worker Types on X-axis for 5 groups 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
In Worker Type Regular workers, 2015 had the highest SOME LABEL 22500.0 among the 5 groups and in Temporary workers, 2017 had the lowest SOME LABEL 2800.0.
Among all the Worker Types, 2016 had the highest SOME LABEL in Worker Type Regular workers and lowest SOME LABEL in Worker Type Temporary workers.
The maximum SOME LABEL for 2016 that was found in Worker Type Regular workers was 6.3 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in Worker Type Temporary workers.
Among all 5 groups, 2015 had the gap of 19500.0 between the maximum and minimum SOME LABEL observed in Worker Type Regular workers and Temporary workers respectively.

In Worker Type Regular workers, 2015 had the highest SOME LABEL 22500.0 among the 5 groups and in Temporary workers, 2017 had the lowest SOME LABEL 2800.0. The second highest SOME LABEL 20800.0 was observed for 2015 in Worker Type Regular workers.
On average, the Worker Type Regular workers had the highest SOME LABEL for all 5 groups 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017. Whereas Temporary workers had the lowest average SOME LABEL.
